snippet.title: Emile Hirsch Vs Paul Rudd Scene | PRINCE AVALANCHE (2013) Movie CLIP HD
snippet.description:
Emile Hirsch Chases Paul Rudd Scene | PRINCE AVALANCHE (2013) Movie CLIP HD

Two road-crew workers (Paul Rudd, Emile Hirsch) spend the summer of 1988 isolated and away from their city lives, eventually finding themselves at odds with each other and their women back home.
Release date: August 9, 2013 (USA)
Director: David Gordon Green

Buy the film here!
https://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/B00EL6ADGU/joblosmovieempor/
